quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Forrest Gump and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, line, seventeen. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Finish this line delivered by Forrest Gump when he was asking Jenny to marry him. I may not be smart man....

options.text: ....but I will make a good husband.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: ....but I know what love is.

questions.question: What brand of running shoes did fictional character Forrest Gump like to wear?
Did the 1994 movie Forrest Gump win an Oscar for Best Picture?
Who directed the classic movie The Sound of Music?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Robert Wise

questions.question: What city was movie character Forrest Gump born and raised in?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Greenbow, Alabama

questions.question: What were the names of the policeman and the cab driver in the movie Its a Wonderful Life?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bert and Ernie

questions.question: Who won an Academy Award as the director of Forrest Gump?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Robert Zemeckis

questions.question: What was the name of Liesls boyfriend who was Sixteen Going On Seventeen in the movie The Sound of Music?
The movie Forrest Gump was based on a novel published several years before the movie was released.
Haley Joel Osment played Forrest Gumps son in the popular movie.
In Its a Wonderful Life, what was Clarences rank?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: AS2-Angel Second Class

questions.question: In The Sound of Music, the von Trapp Family Singers perform at the Austrian Folk Festival to use as a means to escape the Nazis.  Where did the von Trapp Family Singers place in the competition?
Forrest Gump describes to Jenny all the beautiful scenes he saw while he was running across America. She said she wished she could have been there with him. What does Forrest say in response?

options.text: But you dont like to run Jenny.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: You were.

questions.question: What was Farmer Teds nickname in the movie Sixteen Candles?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Geek

questions.question: Forrest Gump had to ask Jenny to marry him twice before she finally said yes to him.

questions.question: In what city of Oregon was the movie The Goonies set and filmed in?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Fratellis

questions.question: In the film The Goonies, what is the name of Mrs. Walshs Hispanic maid who doesnt speak a word of English?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Chester Copperpot

questions.question: What did the developers want to turn the Goon Docks into in the movie The Goonies?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Golf Course

questions.question: What is the name of Andys jock boyfriend in the movie The Goonies?
What member of  the classic Our Gang comedies had a bit part in the movie Its a Wonderful Life?

What is Chunks real name in the movie The Goonies?

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Baby Ruth

questions.question: Remember George: No man is a failure who has friends is the beginning of an inscription in a book given to George in the movie Its a Wonderful Life. What is the rest of the inscription?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Thanks for the wings

questions.question: In the movie The Goonies, what does Andys boyfriend call her when she refuses to come up out of the well?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A Goonie

questions.question: In the movie The Goonies, Mouth denies Chunk access into the Walsh house unless he does what?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Shakes his fat belly

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Daniel Craig

questions.question: A heart-touching story about two people in love kept apart by time and circumstance. A love story that touched the hearts of Middle America even though the lovers were two men. Heath Ledger plays the part of cowboy Ennis Del Mar. Who plays the part of cowboy Jack Twist?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jake Gyllenhaal

questions.question: The 1997 movie American Werewolf in Paris was filmed entirely in France.

options.text: The Last House on the Left

options.text: I Know What You Did Last Summer

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Peter Jackson

Fred told it to him earlier in the conversation.

questions.question: What does the movie title 48 Hrs. refer to?

options.text: The amount of time that Jack hasnt had a drink
The amount of time that Jack hasnt smoked a cigarette
The amount of time that Reggie and Jack have to catch the bad guys
The amount of time that Jack was married

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The amount of time that Reggie and Jack have to catch the bad guys

questions.question: In the movie Jaws, Matt Hooper, played by Richard Dreyfuss survives a shark attack in his special shark-proof cage. In the novel of the same name, in the same situation, he is killed by the shark.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Michael Cimino

questions.question: There was a sequel to the 80s action comedy 48 Hrs..
Prior to 2007, Charlie Chaplin, Alfred Hitchcock, Stanley Kubrick and Martin Scorsese, who directed a total of 13 Top-100 AFI films, shared this one distinction.

options.text: None of them had ever made a film that won an Oscar for Best Picture.
All of them had worked with Lindsay Lohan.
All of  them had been inspired by Ed Wood.
None of them had won an Oscar for Best Director.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: None of them had won an Oscar for Best Director.

questions.question: In the 1966 movie Batman, based on the ABC TV series, all but one of the villains listed were played by the TV series actors/actresses. Which character was not played by one of the original actors?

options.text: Wuthering Heights and The Best Years of Our Lives
The Birth of a Nation and Ben-Hur

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Wuthering Heights and Ben-Hur

questions.question: Who plays Jonathan E in the 1975 science fiction film Rollerball?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: James Caan

questions.question: The stewardess in the film The Big Bus, played by Stockard Channing, nearly died in what way?

options.text: being crushed by a flying spare tire
drowning in a room filled with soft drinks
being sucked into a handicapped toilet

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: drowning in a room filled with soft drinks

questions.question: Who played Captain Lansen in the 1968 movie The Lost Continent?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Eric Porter
